name: Item - Rogue T16 4P Bonus
description: Killing Spree deals 10% more damage every time it strikes a target. Abilities against a target with Vendetta on it increase your mastery by 66 for 5 sec, stacking up to 20 times. Every time you Backstab, you have a 4% chance to replace your Backstab with Ambush that can be used regardless of Stealth.
